data: Ek baar ek fox jungle mein rehta tha. Vah bahut chalaak aur budhimaan tha. Ek din, vah ek angur ki bagichi mein gaya aur angur khane ki koshish ki, lekin vah angur pakadne mein asafal raha. Usne angur ko khaana chaaha, lekin vah bahut ooncha tha. Phir, usne socha ki angur khaane ke liye vah ooncha nahi hai, aur usne angur ko 'khatta' kaaha aur vah waaha se chala gaya.
